# intendedSpatialExperience

**Instance Property**

The CHHapticEngine’s intended [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AudioToolbox/SpatialAudioExperience].

## Declaration

```swift
var intendedSpatialExperience: any SpatialAudioExperience { get set }
```

## Discussion

Only useful for engines that have audio output.

If unspecified, the property value defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AudioToolbox/AutomaticSpatialAudio].
title: intendedSpatialExperience
